mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( name, category, owner_account_id, description, redirect_url, organization_id, tenant_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{category}, #{owner_account_id}, #{description}, #{redirect_url}, #{organization_id}, #{tenant_id} )
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) AS count FROM product WHERE 1=1 AND organization_id = #{organization_id}
AND ( name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') OR category LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') OR redirect_url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') )
